title: Programming Legalese MCP
description: Machine Coded Principle for our programming legalese.

principles.name: Highly Structured JavaScript for Type Annotation
principles.description:
Our programming legalese, characterized by highly struct
ured JavaScript, inherently annotates type through its consistent and explicit
 structural patterns. This approach ensures clarity, predictability, and facil
itates static analysis without relying solely on formal type annotation syntax
.
benefits: Clearer communication of data structures and interfaces
